kalaniya wishwawidyalaye sanskrutha adhyayana anshaye mahacharya induragare dhammarathana himinuthana bauddha wichara ha mathanthara yannen adahas karanne budupiyanan wahansege deshanawa hewath aadi budu dahamath eyata ekkasu karana lada thawath boho piligath bauddha mathawadath ekka shri lankawe athiwela thibena yam yam adahas pilibandawa sakachcha kirima me lipiyen balaporoththu wanne.samahara kenek bauddha karana pilibandawa prasthuthayan pilibandawa darshanika prapanchayan pilibandawa hithalu prakasha kirimath, ee wagema thama thamanta danena de budupiyanan wahansege hangima hatiyata prakasha kirimath waradiyi.

rawans kandayama wasiyans hamuwe 63-45kin parajayata pathwu athara aananda kings pila ool grins ta erehiwa52-57ka jayak wartha kaleya.thimbairigasyaya polis kshethra balaka mulasthana baskatbol pitiye pawathi palamu tharaga kolambaa jathyanthara pasal kandayama parada lakunu 61-66 jayak himikara ganimata rajakiya kandayama samathwu athara hambanthota yuth kandayama lakunu 54-44k lesin oold senanayakanas pila parajayata path kaleya.tharunyayata hetak sanwidhanaya, hambanthota krida samajaya ekwa sanwidhana karana tharagawaliye pradhana anugrahaka lesa eyar tel samagama katayuthu karayi..
